arts.ttl: Rolfes delighted to "put pressure on other clubs" as Leverkusen close in on Bayern
arts.sum: Simon Rolfes was naturally delighted after Bayer Leverkusen reduced the gap between themselves and Bayern Munich to four points.

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz stars as Bayer Leverkusen cruise to victory in Augsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen secured a crucial 2-0 victory against Augsburg, with goals from Martin Terrier and Florian Wirtz lighting up the Bundesliga title race thanks to Bayern Munich's defeat against Mainz. Despite being the most pressed player on the pitch, targeted 25 times by Augsburg's defence, Wirtz maintained his composure and creativity throughout the match, proving instrumental in Leverkusen's victory.

arts.ttl: Juventus and Inter set to compete with Barcelona for Leverkusen’s Jonathan Tah
arts.sum: Serie A outfits Juventus and Inter have to beat Barcelona to sign Bayer Leverkusen’s Jonathan Tah. According to a report by Daniele Longo, Juventus and Inter are eyeing a potential…

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Bayer Leverkusen preview: Champions looking to extend winning streak
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will look to claim a seventh consecutive victory when they travel to the WWK Arena for Saturday’s Bundesliga meeting with Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Leverkusen to make late decision on Schick for Augsburg trip
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen coach Xabi Alonso is set to make a late decision on the availability of Patrik Schick for Saturday's trip to Augsburg.

arts.ttl: Predicted Bayer Leverkusen XI vs Augsburg
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen travel to Augsburg as they look to continue their uptick in Bundesliga form following their 1-0 win against Inter in the Champions League in midweek. Patrik Schick could…

arts.ttl: Barcelona take lead in race for Jonathan Tah, outpacing Inter and Juventus
arts.sum: Jonathan Tah's future remains uncertain as the talented German defender continues to deliver high-level performances, seemingly unfazed by his contract situation with Bayer Leverkusen, which is set to expire in July. arts.ttl: ‘Working on this deal’ – £33m Leverkusen star’s agent in talks with Liverpool
arts.sum: Liverpool are already planning for life without Trent Alexander-Arnold in the squad. To be clear: The Merseysiders are still keen on keeping the No.66, if possible, amid heavy interest from Spanish champions Real Madrid. Injury: Liverpool player RULED OUT for the YEAR! arts.ttl: Preview: Augsburg vs. Bayer Leverkusen - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Augsburg and Bayer Leverkusen, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
